description: REST API endpoint definitions with HTTP methods, parameters, and responses

input.natural_language: Define a GET endpoint to fetch user by ID

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="getUser" rest="GET /api/users/{id}">
  <q:param name="id" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:return>
    SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = {id}
  </q:return>
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Creates GET /api/users/:id endpoint that fetches user from database

input.natural_language: Create POST endpoint to add new user

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="createUser" rest="POST /api/users">
  <q:param name="name" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:param name="email" type="string" required="true" validator="email" />
  <q:param name="age" type="number" required="false" />
  <q:return>
    INSERT INTO users (name, email, age) VALUES ({name}, {email}, {age})
  </q:return>
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Creates POST /api/users endpoint that inserts new user into database

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="updateUser" rest="PUT /api/users/{id}">
  <q:param name="id" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:param name="name" type="string" required="false" />
  <q:param name="email" type="string" required="false" validator="email" />
  <q:return>
    UPDATE users SET name = {name}, email = {email} WHERE id = {id}
  </q:return>
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Creates PUT /api/users/:id endpoint for user updates

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="deleteUser" rest="DELETE /api/users/{id}">
  <q:param name="id" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:return>
    DELETE FROM users WHERE id = {id}
  </q:return>
</q:function>

<q:function name="searchUsers" rest="GET /api/users/search">
  <q:param name="name" type="string" required="false" />
  <q:param name="minAge" type="number" required="false" />
  <q:param name="maxAge" type="number" required="false" />
  <q:return>
    SELECT * FROM users
    WHERE (name LIKE '%{name}%' OR {name} IS NULL)
    AND (age >= {minAge} OR {minAge} IS NULL)
    AND (age <= {maxAge} OR {maxAge} IS NULL)
  </q:return>
</q:function>

<q:function name="listUsers" rest="GET /api/users">
  <q:param name="page" type="number" required="false" default="1" />
  <q:param name="limit" type="number" required="false" default="10" validator="range(1,100)" />
  <q:return>
    SELECT * FROM users
    LIMIT {limit} OFFSET {(page - 1) * limit}
  </q:return>
</q:function>

input.natural_language: Get posts for a specific user

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="getUserPosts" rest="GET /api/users/{userId}/posts">
  <q:param name="userId" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:return>
    SELECT * FROM posts WHERE user_id = {userId}
  </q:return>
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Creates GET /api/users/:userId/posts endpoint for nested resources
